channel.title: New Project: Seeking Help
channel.description:
Hello--
I've lurked these forums every so often for a while, and finally decided it was time to come forth. I'm extremely interested in developing a Runescape Classic Private Server. Like many of the contemporary servers, I'd like to go beyond just providing a simple (or pk biased) classic experience and I assume that the work involved would be a little harder than other undertakings.
I'm looking to form a team to help me develop the ideas that I have in mind. Anyone with experience working with an RSC Private Server is welcome to send me a private message, whereupon I will give you my little powerpoint. All I'd ask is for privacy (the assumption of non-disclosure).
I know that it is hard for any one of you to adequately measure the merit behind this post, especially without a more comprehensive understanding of what I aim to do, but I think that those of you who do respond will be intrigued by my proposition.
There's no money to be involved (if there comes to a point where we need money to pay for a website or additional resources, I will fund all of the expenses) and no commitment necessary. In fact, if you are simply interested in what I am up to, I will gladly share my idea under the assumption of no-competition (lol, post-facebook, one must keep their proprietary ideas safe). I know that I am probably deviating the norm by seeking a project for a potential commercial release, which requires this thin veil of secrecy. However, this is simply the best place to find real RSC PS developers, and therefore I humbly request your attention.
Tl;dr
I'd like to form a team to develop a project I have in mind based of RSC. Private message me for more information. :-)
Thank you,
Az

[/quote]

lol at the thought of me asking for your help.[/quote]
Just more evidence on how fucking stupid you really are.

Read full topic

item.title: New Project: Seeking Help
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Azrafyl, post:1, topic:443659”]Hello–

I’ve lurked these forums every so often for a while, and finally decided it was time to come forth. I’m extremely interested in developing a Runescape Classic Private Server. Like many of the contemporary servers, I’d like to go beyond just providing a simple (or pk biased) classic experience and I assume that the work involved would be a little harder than other undertakings.

I’m looking to form a team to help me develop the ideas that I have in mind. Anyone with experience working with an RSC Private Server is welcome to send me a private message, whereupon I will give you my little powerpoint. All I’d ask is for privacy (the assumption of non-disclosure).

I know that it is hard for any one of you to adequately measure the merit behind this post, especially without a more comprehensive understanding of what I aim to do, but I think that those of you who do respond will be intrigued by my proposition.

There’s no money to be involved (if there comes to a point where we need money to pay for a website or additional resources, I will fund all of the expenses) and no commitment necessary. In fact, if you are simply interested in what I am up to, I will gladly share my idea under the assumption of no-competition (lol, post-facebook, one must keep their proprietary ideas safe). I know that I am probably deviating the norm by seeking a project for a potential commercial release, which requires this thin veil of secrecy. However, this is simply the best place to find real RSC PS developers, and therefore I humbly request your attention.

Tl;dr

I’d like to form a team to develop a project I have in mind based of RSC. Private message me for more information.

Thank you,

Az[/quote]There’s gonna be something cool coming out soon.
Wait for it, if you don’t like it, start your own.
